TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class HttpMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class HttpMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 藉著使用 HTTP-GET 或 HTTP-POST 將這個屬性套用到 XML Web Service 用戶端，設定型別以序列化傳送至 XML Web Service 方法的參數，及讀取來自 XML Web Service 方法的回應。

span.span: Applying this attribute to an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST, sets the types that serialize the parameters sent to an XML Web service method and read the response from the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果將 XML Web service 用戶端呼叫 XML Web 服務方法使用 HTTP-GET必須設為`XmlReturnReader`並設定為`UrlParameterWriter`。If an XML Web service client calls an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET, must be set to `XmlReturnReader` and set to `UrlParameterWriter`. 必須設定 XML Web service 用戶端叫用 XML Web 服務使用 HTTP POST來`XmlReturnReader`並至`HtmlFormParameterWriter`。XML Web service clients invoking a XML Web service using HTTP-POST must set to `XmlReturnReader` and to `HtmlFormParameterWriter`. ## Examples 下列範例是 Wsdl.exe 公用程式，呼叫使用 HTTP POST 的 XML Web 服務公用程式所產生的 proxy 類別。The following example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for calling an XML Web service utility using HTTP-POST. Wsdl.exe 就會自動提供正確的型別，如並，以及指定的 proxy 類別繼承自。The Wsdl.exe automatically supplies the correct types for and , along with specifying that the proxy class inherits from . [!code-cpp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，這型別會將 XML Web Service 用戶端傳來的參數序列化至 XML Web Service 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a that serializes parameters sent from an XML Web service client to the XML Web service method.

value.span: ，會將 XML Web Service 用戶端傳來的參數序列化至 XML Web Service 方法。

span.span: A that serializes parameters sent from an XML Web service client to an XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web service 用戶端會叫用使用 HTTP-GET 或 HTTP-POST，對 XML Web service 方法必須是`XMLReturnReader`。If the XML Web service client is invoking an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST, must be `XMLReturnReader`. ## Examples 此範例是 Wsdl.exe 公用程式所產生 XML Web service 用戶端使用 HTTP GET，設定的 proxy 類別設為必要值的`XMLReturnReader`。The example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET, setting to the required value of `XMLReturnReader`. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web service 用戶端會叫用 XML Web 服務方法使用 HTTP-GET必須是`UrlParameterWriter`，而必須設定用戶端使用 HTTP POST至`HtmlFormParameterWriter`。If the XML Web service client is invoking an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET, must be `UrlParameterWriter`, whereas a client using HTTP-POST must set to `HtmlFormParameterWriter`. ## Examples 此範例是 Wsdl.exe 公用程式所產生 XML Web service 用戶端使用 HTTP GET，設定的 proxy 類別設為必要值的`UrlParameterWriter`。The example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET, setting to the required value of `UrlParameterWriter`. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
